resources.string: Stay updated with rail accidents, issues, planned strikes and changes in service schedule. This feature is currently not yet implemented.
No trains are on the timetable for this station.\nLast update %1$s
Start searching for any RFI Passenger Railway Station
Search and add your favourite stations for quick access
There are no issues currently in %1$s!
Set the time (in minutes) between each refresh
Use the new UI that is being developed. Requires app restart to be applied. Be warned, the UI is unstable and may crash, if unable to go back to the current UI, clear the Application\'s data.
Immediately load Notices, before opening the Notices tab, to have them immediately ready.
When enabled, the app keeps a local copy of the search options to provide a faster searching experience.\nIf disabled, expect to wait a couple of seconds before being able to search.
Enables a background service that will automatically notify you if any strikes have been announced. Notifications will be sent every day at 18:00.
Right now only train run by Trenitalia are available.
The train number cannot contain any letters or other characters.

[{\"title\":\"Major Rework\",\"content\":[\"The application\'s code has been cleaned up and brings improvements in loading times for arrivals and departures.\",\"With these improvements, the app is now more maintainable so future updates will be implemented faster.\"]},{\"title\":\"Improved UI\",\"content\":[\"Enjoy a cleaner and more optimised UI while searching stations. The bookmarking feature (previously called Favourites) now works as intended and the UI properly refreshes when you add and remove bookmarks. The new search page is more inline with Material 3\'s design guidelines and includes a new operator field with the Station\'s name that will come in handy in the future, when more european railway operators are going to be added.\",\"The train list in the arrivals/departures view has been improved, now the ugly clipping with the standard \\\"Compact\\\" view is gone and a new \\\"Detailed\\\" list option has been added in settings.\"]},{\"title\":\"Ready for the future\",\"content\":[\"While this update was light, mostly being an early spring clean of all the codebase, many new features have yet to come.\",\"In the next update, you\'ll finally be able to receive optional notifications once strikes are announced by Trenitalia, view more detailed information for each train and search Trenitalia\'s trains by number.\",\"In the future, you will also be able to view a station\'s daily planned schedule and details for the station, like services (e.g. Cafes, bathrooms, platforms and accessibility) and geolocation, which will allow you to view the station closest to you.\"]}]
Choose how you want your train list to look like for arrivals and departures
The classic look of the app. Compact and straightfoward, containing all the important information in a simple linear UI.
A new UI that shows a bit more information in a more taller UI, that gives each element more space.
